DIALOG: Whenever Defect generates a Void, it goes to the top of your draw pile.
Begins the fight with 2 Bronze Orb minions. NL Gains 1 Artifact each turn if it did not already have Artifact.
Watcher is debuffed with Fall from Grace. NL When Fall from Grace triggers, it is reset and can be triggered again.
Whenever you play a 0-cost card, if Silent has less than 7 cards in hand, she gains a Shiv.
When Watcher is reduced to 50% HP, she enters Wrath permanently. NL Watcher's Wrath increases damage dealt and received by 50% instead of 100%.
A mirror image of Silent is masking her real location. Attacking the mirror removes it from combat for the turn.
Ironclad begins the fight with a Fortification, which will grant him Block each turn. NL When the Fortification has been destroyed, Ironclad loses Barricade and all Block.
Poison applied to you triggers at the end of your turn. NL Before triggering Poison, for each [E] available, spend it to remove 10 Poison.
Whenever you play a Power, Defect gains 1 Focus.
Ironclad's Reaper does not Exhaust and targets ALL Mushrooms. NL When Ironclad kills a Mushroom, he gains 1 Strength and heals 20 HP.
Merchant's Bombs explode one turn faster than normal.
Watcher gains 1 Mantra whenever you play a card. NL Watcher loses 5 Mantra at the start of her turn. NL Watcher's Divinity Stance is permanent.
Whenever Ironclad generates a status card, a duplicate is added into your discard pile.
